name: M.O.R.T.A.L.
short_description:
M.O.R.T.A.L. is a new general-purpose programming language now under development. It is meant to take the best features of multiple paradigms and combine them all into a single, easy-to-use language, suitable for professionals and hobbyists alike. (The basic OOP paradigm, with metaprogramming features, will be implemented first.)

Its primary goal is to allow very heavy computations to be performed efficiently and easily, even by scientists from other fields than computer science.

For more information about the language, see the Wiki.
